alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 25 at 3:55AM MST until December 25 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 7 AM MST this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers at mile marker 71 on Interstate 25.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
